name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, Appellee v. 300 NORTH BROAD STREET, LTD., Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of May, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
